game.name: Yorda's Quest: A Lighthearted Magic Fantasy RPG
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Laughs and legends await you! Join Yorda, the country bumpkin with hopes of heroism, on a light-hearted romp through the land! Fight demons, gain friends, and yuk it up in this parody of classic RPGs!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Laughs and legends await you! Join Yorda, the country bumpkin with hopes of heroism, on a light-hearted romp through the land! Fight demons, gain friends, and yuk it up in this parody of classic RPGs!
